Articles.Content:
Promethium Experimental Weaponry (A BDArmory Addon)

BDArmory: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-90-BDArmory-v0-7-3-%28new-cruise-missiles%29-Dev-Thread-March-23

Promethium industries proudly presents the latest in conventional weaponry! Our catalog includes fifteen new missile weapons and and two new unguided munitions! Place your orders today!

Promethium industries is not responsible for any damage to any persons or objects of any kind and from any source that may possibly be traced to any of the items sold by our organization. All sales are final.

After a long Hiatus I have returned to resume development. School is not yet over so do not expect a miracle since i am remaking all parts and there are at least 150 of them planned.

I will add more details when the forum stops crashing and wasting half an hour of post edits but i wanted to say thank you to SpannerMonkey for maintaining this mod in my absence.

Until i get things fully underway still refer to his P.E.W Continued thread for an up to date version.

Development progress will be posted on my youtube channel periodically 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHhDcPcC_jNkLuyaUstDtEg

 

In the spoiler is the current status of all parts in the mod. Some are not listed because hey a man has to have secrets ;). suffice to say what IS listed is going to be epic and what inst will be even more so.

 

I also want to say thank you to everyone who has downloaded this mod whether long ago or just yesterday. I do this not for money or fame but because i love doing it for you and seeing what others can achieve with my work.

So once again. Thank you.

Pretty missile are pretty.f

Definitely going to keep my eye on this one.

Some suggestions:

Paveway IV bomb

Brimstone (Hellfire but better)

MDBA Meteor

Storm Shadow (cruise missile)

Aim-4

WE.177 (Nuclear bomb)

Skybolt (long range nuclear standoff missile)

Hell, I might even have a go at these myself and send them your way.

The first missile says "Surface to ground"

I'm assuming you meant ground to ground?

The first missile says "Surface to ground"

I'm assuming you meant ground to ground?

Yes I wrote that in a hurry and may have made that mistake thanks for catching it though I meant to type Air to ground

- - - Updated - - -

Definitely going to keep my eye on this one.

Some suggestions:

Paveway IV bomb

Brimstone (Hellfire but better)

MDBA Meteor

Storm Shadow (cruise missile)

Aim-4

WE.177 (Nuclear bomb)

Skybolt (long range nuclear standoff missile)

Hell, I might even have a go at these myself and send them your way.

I'm mostly going for more modern weapons so the AIM-4 is off and nuclear weapons are really really hard to scale properly due to physics range limits in fact the only reason I'm including the AIM-26 (which is an upgraded AIM-4 by the way) is its yield is only 250t so I can make a reasonable blast radius for it. As for the others I'm focusing on American and Russian weapons for right now i can expand into European ones when I finish I just don't want to take on too big of a project at once since I'm just learning
turns out my texturing skills are very much sub par so if anyone is interested in helping me with the UV Maps i would greatly appreciate it
Yeah, nobody likes texturing.

Yeah, nobody likes texturing.

Well I'm literally just learning how to do it so liking it isn't even the problem its managing to do it at all! I got the BLU-82 to a workable point I think but I'm kind of scared of what comes next to be honest

The BLU looks pretty good.

As for getting it going in Unity, if you search on Baha's thread he posted an image of the missile hierarchy, I'll see if I can find the post...

Doesn't look like the unity stuff will be too difficult for missiles, even for turrets it's pretty straightforward (if you know how to set it up properly, which I don't).

Thanks for the link this will help a lot are there any weapons you would like to see? I. Debating rewarding those who help with weapons within reason of course and only modern weapons (either in use or used within the past 20 years)

I think you should work on a guided missile pod, for swarm firing fun.

If you could make it so they all launch at once on a hotkey, that would be even better

I think you should work on a guided missile pod, for swarm firing fun.

If you could make it so they all launch at once on a hotkey, that would be even better

The current rocket pod system doesn't fire missiles but rather small models that are basically bullets with thrust so I can't do this yet Bd has talked about changing the code but for now that is out of my capability

The current rocket pod system doesn't fire missiles but rather small models that are basically bullets with thrust so I can't do this yet Bd has talked about changing the code but for now that is out of my capability

You could talk to InfiniteDice from skillful, he has a guided rocket pod. Maybe he could tell you how to make it.

You could talk to InfiniteDice from skillful, he has a guided rocket pod. Maybe he could tell you how to make it.

I may but skillful is built around its own system and I don't even want to begin to try and understand it. Yes I would greatly like it but in the real world very few guided rocket pods exist in fact I can't think of any off the top of my head
Hydra 70 has a guided version AFAIK.

Hydra 70 has a guided version AFAIK.

Well there you go but as I said its unfortunately out of my control ATM

Something I have not seen yet is either a Tomahawk, Paveway or an air dropped torpedo. Now the torpedo would be really cool but that is a new direction. So I wouldn't have the first idea about what it would take.

Edited May 1, 2015 by V8jester
The torpedo would probably not work, as for now, BDarmory munitions are hardcoded to explode when touching the water.
I really love the addon your doing! Maybe add a small diameter bomb?

Update everyone! i have "completed" the first weapon namely the BLU-82 Daisy Cutter

"refer to first post for pictures"

as you can see in the last picture i still have to get the surface attachment working properly in terms of sitting flush. it will attatch just fine but be hovering up to a meter away from the part it is attached to so if anyone knows how to do properly that please PM me ASAP!

Edited May 2, 2015 by LORDPrometheus

I have high hopes for this mod

most of the "new" missiles in bd armory don't have new models they are just re textured and or resized

Update

texturing is going smoothly now but i cant for the life of me get the models to collide properly and they are always shifted away from where i am clicking when brought in game

also the orientation is wrong so if anyone smarter than me can help that would be greatly appreciated
